author: Special Correspondent
text:
‘Adar Mounam’, a book of collection of poems penned by S. Sobana, was released at a function brought up by the Tamil Nadu Progressive Writers and Artistes Association in the city recently.

Mettur Vasanthi, poet and district joint secretary of the Association, presided over the function and A.K. Nagarajan released the book.

K. Ganesan, Sahitya Akademy writer, received the first copy.

Pavalar Ezhugnayiru, president, Padaippalar Peravai, Madura Bharathi, Salem district president of the Tamil Nadu Progressive Writers and Artistes Association, and R. Samson Raveendran, Executive Director, Mahendra Educational Institutions, offered felicitations.
title: Collection of poems released
